body: 或者要不开一个 OpenJDK 11 的分支，我有一些代码还想改
you can reply ack  to broker by commitSync()

Issues are generally used for bug reports and feature requests, so if you have any questions about     Apache  RocketMQ, it is recommended to discuss it on the mailing list first, the mailing list [address]    (https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact). I will close the Issue first, but please feel free to     reopen it if you have any other issues.

@wlliqipeng hi, I've committed a PR, please check if it is useful :)

AllocateMessageQueueAveragely这个策略？
按我的理解，queue=5,consumer=2，则consumer1会消费queue0-2(3个queue)，consumer2会消费queue3-4(两个queue)。不能整除的情况下，肯定会有某个consumer要多干点活

@coder-zzzz  please describe the content of issues and pr by writing English.
Can you make a association with issue and pr?
@ShannonDing Okay I will review this pr next week.

> @coder-zzzz please describe the content of issues and pr by writing English.
Done
@RongtongJin Any problems?
I can't see the necessity of adding write lock. Could you explain that under which circumstance could lead to concurrent problem? @ZhangShenao
AllocateMessageQueueAveragely策略，如果有n个(queue=5,consumer=2)，则会存在consumer1消费n*3个queue(queue0-2)，consumer2消费n*2个queue(queue3-4)；客户端消费单个topic无所谓，客户端消费n个topic时候干活就有可能很不平均了。

Seems a few guys have already mentioned this topic. See #1938 #1576 #1302 #760. 
And by now the result of the discussion is `no need to fix it`.
@xiangwangcheng 当NameServer剔除非活跃的broker时，如果恰好有一个新的broker注册进来，会导致多个线程并发修改brokerLiveTable

@ZhangShenao  OK, I got you. An optimization is needed.
A new broker registry while scanning not active brokers won't cause a concurrent problem, but putting the same key whiling removing it will.
Hi @lilylei013 What version are you using? I used the latest version and there seems to be no such issue.

This issue does exist. But RocketMQ rebalance needs to ensure that every consumer has the same view (ie the same order of queues and the same order of client id),  so if every consumer shuffles in its own process, it will cause inconsistency of views.
Is it necessary to modify this value, in addition, frequent changes to this value will affect performance?
I checked 4.7.0 version, it's not fix. It's the timertask which is not cancel

You should open an issue in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-client-go. 
Not here
ok, thanks
Only modify two md files~~ why Coverage decreased?
默认情况下，nameserver的端口号是9876，用的是TCP协议。开启HTTP协议端口是无法访问的
I found this issue #1957  today, but didn't find this issue #1950.I already commit a pr #1958  to fix #1957
I think the AsyncAppender-Dispatcher-Thread is used by log, so it is usefull , can not shutdown when producer shutdown

Hi @ Dovelol, if you want to submit a PR You need to do the following things:
Firstly, plz submit related issues to link this PR and explain the purpose of PR according to the format. 
Second, you need change the target branch to develop. 
Finally, pass the CI.
I will close this pr first because it has too many problems and I don’t see its value.

Hi @pandaclj if you want to submit a PR You need to do the following things:
Firstly, plz submit related issues to link this PR and explain the purpose of PR according to the format.
Second, you need change the target branch to develop.
Third, conflicts must be resolved
Finally, pass the CI.
I will close this pr first because it has too many problems.
Could you tell me which version you are using? it seems there is no issue with the latest version in my environment.

我也是这样做的。使用`org.springframework.transaction.support.TransactionSynchronization` 来绑定到spring的事务管理上。
修改发送半消息逻辑。直接拿到sendresult 绑定到上下文
1. 在beforeCommit将消息通过获取本事务的数据库链接来写入数据库
2. 在afterCompletion根据状态去把上下文的sendresult  commit/rollback 掉
3. 由事务消息回查兜底

但是现在感觉偶尔会出现发送了半消息.没有确认然后也没有回查.
 在 RMQ_SYS_TRANS_HALF_TOPIC 里面可以查到对应的消息，但是回查确没有对应的日志

@spyvip RocketMQ provided RPCHooK can be used to intercept all requests and responses. but it seems that it cannot resolve your issue.

yeah this make sense. Because when we delete a topic we don't delete the entries in the CommitLog, and the ReputMessageService will catch up from CommitLog.

In `doReput()` I didn't see the logic that checks if a CommitLog entry belongs to an existing topic. We might need to validate each CommitLog entry. 

I will look deeper into this issue, I'm reading source code recently so maybe I can help with it a bit.

CommitLog#recoverAbnormally (deprecated) and DefaultMessageStore#doReput() used `doDispatch()`. We will do filter to filter out deleted topic message. Problem is when do we filter.

Do we put the filter in `doReput()` or put the filter in dispatcher implementation like `CommitLogDispatcherBuildConsumeQueue`. I think the later might be better.
